Build all Zashboard targets

Source: R/build_all.R
build_all.Rd

Generates the static site, Shinylive bundle, and a Quarto project from a Zashboard spec.

Usage

build_all(
  spec = NULL,
  targets = c("static", "shiny", "shinylive", "quarto"),
  render_quarto = FALSE,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

spec

Path to a YAML spec file or a pre-parsed list with the same structure. If NULL, the package template spec is used.

targets

Character vector of targets to build. Valid values include "static", "shinylive", and "quarto". Use to build a subset (e.g., targets = c("static","quarto")). If NULL, builds all.

render_quarto

Logical; if TRUE, also render the Quarto project after generating it. Default FALSE (recommended in CI).

overwrite

Logical; if TRUE, overwrite any existing output directories. Default FALSE.

...

Reserved for future extensions; currently unused.

Value

Invisibly, a list with elements static_dir, shinylive_dir, quarto_dir, and shiny_app (the last may be NULL when not built).
